::Zardus/Shredder/DeathStorm::

Zardus nods. "You can have your own room. And acces to my facilities. Follow 
me back to my base."

With that, he turns around, flying off back to the Alliance base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder nods, taking the box from Bobertron.

"Allright. Tell him I'll con-" Shedder is interrupted by several screams, 
including one over his comm-link.

"Stay here, I'll be right back," he says into to Bazooka, Mantella, and 
Bobertron, activating his jetpack and flying off.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In his ship, DeathStorm triumphantly raises a small black device.

"At last!" he exclaims to himself, "The Alliance shall be mine!"

He picks up several other objects and walks out of his ship, setting it on 
cloak and flying off to the alliance base.
